snippet.title: As We Descend - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Update - Release has been delayed! For more information, read here: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1769830/view/572625355297260278?l=english

---

We've dropped a massive update for our Demo as a part of our entry into this February's Steam Next Fest. Plus, now you know that the game is imminently slated to launch!

Play the demo on Steam right now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3256480/As_We_Descend_Demo/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=date_reveal_trailer&utm_medium=video

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1769830/As_We_Descend/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=date_reveal_trailer&utm_medium=video

As We Descend is a roguelike deckbuilder with the soul of a strategy game. Find salvation for the last City of humankind, and descend all the way to the core.

Leave your question and thoughts below!
